channel.title: Arizona Highway on Roadsign Pictures
channel.description: Recent content in Arizona Highway on Roadsign Pictures

item.title: AZ-83 North - Distance Marker
item.description: Distance marker on AZ-83 north. Distance to I-10.

item.title: AZ-83 North - Scenic Byway
item.description: AZ-83 North and Scenic Byway sign in Sonoita. AZ-83 is part of the Patagonia-Sonoita Scenic Road.

item.title: AZ-82 East Approaching AZ-83
item.description: AZ-82 east approaching AZ-83. Use AZ-83 north for I-10. Continue east on AZ-82 for SR-90. Turn right on county road for Parker Canyon Lake.

item.title: AZ-82 East - Sonoita
item.description: Entering Sonoita on AZ-82 East.

item.title: AZ-82 East - Patagonia City Limits
item.description: Patagonia City Limits on AZ-82 East.

item.title: AZ-101 South - Exit 2 and Exit 1AB
item.description: AZ-101 Loop South at Exit 2 - McDowell Road. Approaching Exit 1B - I-10 East/Phoenix.

item.title: AZ-101 Loop South - Exit 2 and Exit 1AB
item.description: AZ-101 Loop South approaching Exit 2 - McDowell Road and Exit 1AB-I-10/Phoenix/Los Angeles.

item.title: AZ-101 Loop South - Exit 11
item.description: AZ-101 Loop South at Exit 11 - To US-60/Grand Ave./91st Ave.

item.title: AZ-101 Loop South Approaching Exit 11
item.description: AZ-101 Loop South approaching Exit 11. Use Exit 11 for US-60/To US-93/Kingman/Las Vegas.

item.title: AZ-101 West - Exit 23 and Exit 24
item.description: AZ-101 Loop West at Exit 24 - 19th Ave. Approaching Exit 23 - I-17/Phoenix/Flagstaff. All of the loop highways around Phoenix have different color shields on the older signs. AZ-101 Loop has a blue shield.

item.title: AZ-101 Loop West Approaching Exit 24 and Exit 23BC
item.description: AZ-101 Loop West approaching Exit 24 - 19th Ave. Approaching Exit 23 - I-17/Phoenix/Flagstaff.

item.title: AZ-101 West - Pima Freeway
item.description: AZ-101 Loop West - Pima Freeway

item.title: End AZ-51 North at AZ-101 Loop
item.description: End AZ-51 North at Exit 15A - AZ-101 Loop East and Exit 15B - AZ-101 Loop West.

item.title: AZ-51 North - Piestewa Freeway
item.description: AZ-51 North - Piestewa Freeway. Most freeways in the Phoenix area have names and are signed with the shields.

item.title: AZ-51 North - Exit 8
item.description: AZ-51 north at Exit 8 - 32nd St. No control city is given for AZ-51 North.

item.title: AZ-143 North - Exit 3
item.description: AZ-143 north at Exit 3 - AZ-202 Loop/Mesa. All of the loop roads in the Phoenix area have different color shields. AZ-202 Loop has a brown shield.

item.title: AZ-202 West - Exit 55AB
item.description: AZ-202 West Exit 55 Offramp at Exit 55B - I-10 East/Tucson and Exit 55A - I-10 West/Phoenix.

item.title: End AZ-202 West at I-10
item.description: End AZ-202 Loop west at I-10 - Exit 55AB - Tucson/Phoenix. Continue straight for Pecos Road.

item.title: AZ-202 Loop West Approaching Exit 53 and Exit 55AB
item.description: AZ-202 Loop west approaching Exit 53 - Kyrene Road. Approaching 55AB - I-10/Phoenix-Tucson.

item.title: End AZ-101 Loop at AZ-202 Loop
item.description: End AZ-101 Loop at AZ-202 Loop.

item.title: AZ-101 Loop South - Exit 61BC
item.description: AZ-101 Loop south at Exit 61B - AZ-202 Loop West and Exit 61C - AZ-202 Loop East. This is the southern end of AZ-101 Loop.

item.title: AZ-101 Loop South - Exit 61 AB
item.description: AZ-101 Loop south at Exit 61A - Price Road. Approaching Exit 61B - AZ-202 Loop West and Exit 61C - AZ-202 Loop East.

item.title: AZ-90 North Approaching I-10
item.description: AZ-90 north approaching I-10.

item.title: AZ-90 North Approaching I-10
item.description: AZ-90 north approaching I-10.

item.title: AZ-82 East At AZ-90
item.description: AZ-82 east at AZ-90. Use AZ-90 north for Jct. I-10. Use AZ-90 south for Sierra Vista.

item.title: AZ-82 East Approaching AZ-90
item.description: AZ-82 east approaching AZ-90.

item.title: AZ-82 East at AZ-83
item.description: AZ-82 east at AZ-83.

item.title: AZ-82 East Approaching AZ-83
item.description: AZ-82 east approaching AZ-83. Use AZ-83 north for I-10. Use AZ-83 south for Parker Canyon Lake.

item.title: AZ-82 East - Entering Patagonia
item.description: Entering Patagonia on AZ-82 East. Elevation 4,050. Founded in 1898.

item.title: Begin AZ-82 East
item.description: First AZ-82 shield eastbound.

item.title: AZ-189 North at I-19
item.description: AZ-189 north at I-19 onramp.

item.title: AZ-189 North Approaching I-19
item.description: AZ-189 north approaching I-19. Use I-19 south for the International Border. Use I-19 north for Tucson.

item.title: Border Corssing Status on AZ-189 South
item.description: Border crossing status on AZ-189 south for the truck border crossing. The port is currently open.

item.title: AZ-71 North at US-93
item.description: AZ-71 north at US-93.

item.title: AZ-71 North Approaching US-93
item.description: AZ-71 north approaching US-93. Use US-93 south for Wickenburg

item.title: AZ-71 North Approaching US-93
item.description: AZ-71 north approaching US-93.

item.title: End AZ-71 South at US-60
item.description: End AZ-71 south at US-60. Use US-60 east for Wickenburg and Phoenix. Use US-60 west for Los Angeles.

item.title: End AZ-89L at US-89
item.description: S. Lake Powell Blvd. at US-89. Use US-89 north for Glen Canyon Dam and Kanab. Use US-89 south for Flagstaff. Sign uses Clearview font.

item.title: AZ-89L at US-89
item.description: S. Lake Powell Blvd. approaching US-89.

item.title: AZ-89L Approaching US-89
item.description: Jct US-89 on S. Lake Powell Blvd.

item.title: AZ-89L To AZ-98
item.description: To AZ-98 on N. Lake Powell Blvd. east of US-89.
